opinion: I'd give your collection an okay rating. Maybe like 6 out of 10. Keep building!
Let's just be nice and say you have a lot of work to do to make your collection respectable. Keep collecting
Very nice collection. In my not so humble opinion you are a solid collector!
Wow wow wow, you have phenomenal taste in movie posters.. impressive!
Ouch, this collection is smelly.. keep collecting!
I award you no points, and may God have mercy on your soul.
